Author: Goladus
Content:
I'm not sure if that explains Japan, though.

I think cultural values play a part, but I think it has more to do with the way early musical education typically works in those countries.

Author: Goladus
Content: Music has the most abstract of all useful languages, but I wouldn't say Jazz is anything special in that regard.  Perhaps I'm misunderstanding you.

Author: ralph
Content: This is Startup News, not Slashdot.  Go and post this kind of thing there.  Or on Digg.  Or Reddit.  We're here because we want something different from all of those others.
